title: Support for creating + using Custom Emojis
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

I'm always frustrated when my colleagues can slack around creating and spamming their own emojis while I can't. According to the [Microsoft Documentation](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/use-custom-emoji-in-microsoft-teams-84feb1c4-6d2b-4ecd-8e55-a93c828fc53a), I should be able to, however I suspect the current `teams-for-linux` client doesn't seem to implement it.

**Describe the solution you'd like**

I want to be able to manage my organizations' emojis via `teams-for-linux`.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**

Cry in awe of not being able to party-parrot inside Teams.

**Additional context**

I've also tried it in my browser using `teams.microsoft.com` however it also won't work there.
